name: Outer Origins
description: In the far future, humans have begun to colonize new planets beyond Earth. But before they can terraform the planet, they need to gather the resources necessary to survive. Through the use of the Remote Operated Outer Terraforming System, they can send robots deep into the ground to get the resources for them. Be warned though, they never figured out how to get the R.O.O.T.S out of the ground…
